Content.Text:
<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Let's begin the <RED><MOJI0>
<MOJI2></RED>
competition!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
First, let's introduce our 4 contestants
and their 4 yaks in order.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Entry No. 1
From <CHARANAME0> Farm, <CHARANAME1> and
<CHARANAME2>.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Entry No. 2
From <CHARANAME0> Farm, <CHARANAME1> and
<CHARANAME2>.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Entry No. 3
From <CHARANAME0> Farm, <CHARANAME1> and
<CHARANAME2>.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Entry No. 4
From <CHARANAME0> Farm, <CHARANAME1> and
<CHARANAME2>.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Next, it's time to introduce the judge.
Neil will do the judging today.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm Neil. My judging is pretty strict,
so you better brace yourself.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well then, let's get on with the 
competition. Everyone besides the judge,
just sit tight for a moment.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thanks for your patience. And now, it's
time for the results presentation.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
This competition's winner is...

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
<CHARANAME0> Farm's <BLUE><CHARANAME4></BLUE>
and <CHARANAME2>!
Congratulations!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
In 2nd place, we have
<CHARANAME1> and <CHARANAME2> 
the yak.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
In 3nd place, it's
<CHARANAME1> and <CHARANAME2> 
the yak.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
And in 4th place, we have
<CHARANAME1> and <CHARANAME2> 
the yak.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well now, its time to award the winner.
<CHARANAME4>, please step forward.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Well done on the win! Your prize is 
<GREEN><ITEMNAME0></GREEN>. Raise your yaks
with just as much care in the future.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Well done on the win! Your prize is 
<GREEN><ITEMNAME0></GREEN> and
<GREEN><ITEMNAME1></GREEN>. 
<PAGE>
Raise your yaks with just as much care
in the future, all right?

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Well done on the win! Your prize is 
<GREEN><ITEMNAME0></GREEN> and...
<PAGE>
<GREEN><ITEMNAME1></GREEN> and <GREEN><ITEMNAME2></GREEN>'s
blueprint. Raise your yaks with just as
much care in the future.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
In addition, the yak milk's brand has
been elevated to a <RED>Unknown Brand</RED>.
Try to aim even higher.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
In addition, the yak milk's brand has
been elevated to a <RED>Popular Brand</RED>.
Try to aim even higher.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
In addition, the yak milk's brand has
been elevated to a <RED>Top Brand</RED>. Stay
hungry and keep giving it your best, OK?

The shipping price of the yak's milk
and related goods went up <BLUE><MOJI0></BLUE>
compared to the brandless variety. Nice!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT>
Well then, <RED><MOJI0> and
<MOJI2></RED> are finished.
Thank you very much, everyone!
Beginner Class
Intermediate Class
Advanced Class
